reviews.review: Demasiado cheater si no tienes el factor de confianza en verde

This game is awesome but will sometimes get you a little bit salty. I have received additional compensation for this half-assed review of the game.
Um dos melhores jogos de tiro que ja joguei o que mata são os hackers
BUY THIS GAME AND HAVE A NICE DAY!!! DONT THINK ABOUT BUY OR NOT, buy immediately.

For all of you epic gamers out there, I suggest this super and I mean SUPER easy game. I honestly don't know why they have esports for this game. You just get a gun and click on the enemies head a few times... Then BOOM you win. The grenades are also cool I guess, I mean don't get me wrong I love team killing in casual with the molotov, but other than that they are completely useless. I mean what is even the point of the flashbang? Just don't look at it... and the smoke? Just walk around it.... same for the molotov... The only good grenade is the explosion one. This is because you can make the decoy completely useless by just turning down you volume... Truly the only good things this game has to offer, is the ability to one shot taze my enemies, even thought my team gets really mad for some reason. Even though the zeus carries... The only one problem with this game truly is the lack of ability to create a zeus statrak like come on I would totally buy that lmao. The other thing I don't get is why they run with knifes!!?? didn't their mother tell them that is dangerous??!!! Personally I like to run with my gun, because it is so much safer, which is usually the negev because it is just so powerful. I mean just look at it what can stop the insanity that they call the negev? Honestly my loadout for this game is the zeus, dual berretas, and negev. Haven't lost a single game xD
Fun game to play with friends. Not fun game to play ranked.

- Good Physics

- Maps are actually pretty mediocre tho (too close-ranged)
